title: So, two things.
body:
First, when are we gutting Corki? Champ has been god tier for long enough.

Second, when are we gutting or removing Death's Dance? ADCs should be PUNISHED for being out of position, not be given a chance at surviving.

replies.body:
pro tip: things never deserve to be "gutted". Removed, nerfed, adjusted, or buffed? Sure, but never gutted

also, since when has Corki been "god-tier", let alone currently? He sits at a 48-49% win-ratio in the midlane (his most played lane) across *all elos* with an 8-9% play-rate. Those are decent numbers but hardly OP, let alone god-tier.

Death's Dance: I don't have any stats atm to confirm or deny my beliefs but I *do* hold the opinion that it's a pretty op item that provides quite unenjoyable gameplay at the very least

No I mean gutted. 

Corki needs to lose something (maybe his armor shred), and then have his numbers turned way down. He is just beyond broken right now.

Death's Dance needs to lose either the damage reduction or the lifesteal (or half the AD), and maybe it'd be fair.

1. I never said what you meant, I said what you should say to make reasonable sense

2. You can't impose your beliefs as facts. Actual facts show that Corki is not op in any way.

3. Imo I think it should lose it's cdr and/or just revert the buff to bring it back down to 15%. Doubling is was a very drastic buff with little to no reasoning behind it

Corki gutted? idk about that.

Deaths Dance, i agree though, to a point. Should they be allowed an option to outplay an unfavorable position? sure... to the degree deaths dance allows? no
